page.title: 05RICHMOND PARK
page.content: In Richmond Park there are twenty houses.Of these twenty there are four pensioners' houses.Pearse's house is white. My house is yellow.Ciaran Shields lives in Richmond.His house is a brown house. Michael Mallon's house is a white house There is a play park in Richmond.There is a big field up above the play park.We make camps in it.In the play park we play "A man for himself"and we play ball tig.In Richmond all the houses are different colours.Richmond got its name because of a neighbouring townland of the same name.Richmond Park was built by contractors called McAleer and Teague about three years ago.That was around 1982.
